scripts.restore-global: npm install -g typescript tslint typings nodemon
scripts.restore-all: npm run restore-global && npm run restore-local
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run tslint
scripts.docker-run: npm run build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml build && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.debug.yml up -d
scripts.docker-watch: npm run docker-run && npm run build-watch
scripts.docker-cleanup: npm run docker-stop && docker rmi <%- projectName %>-api <%- projectName %>-api-base-livedebug
